headline: U.S. Army Awards Salesforce $5.6B Contract to Accelerate Military Modernization and Department of War Readiness
summary: SAN FRANCISCO & WASHINGTON, January 27, 2026--Salesforce (NYSE: CRM), the world’s #1 AI CRM, today announced that the U.S. Army has awarded the company a $5.6 billion, 10-year* Indefinite Delivery Indefinite Quantity (IDIQ) contract. The landmark agreement is executed through Computable Insights LLC.**, a wholly owned subsidiary dedicated to Salesforce’s national security operations. Through Missionforce National Security, Salesforce will bring the best of private sector innovation to support th

headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: GM, Micron, Salesforce
summary: ↗️ General Motors (GM): The U.S.'s largest automaker reported a $3.3 billion quarterly loss, but still beat expectations. Shares jumped 4% in premarket trading. ↗️ RTX (RTX): The defense contractor's quarterly results topped forecasts, boosted by demand for munitions and missiles, and the company gave an upbeat outlook.

headline: New Global CDO Report Reveals Data Governance and AI Literacy as Key Accelerators in AI Adoption
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., January 27, 2026--Informatica from Salesforce, a leader in enterprise AI-powered cloud data management, has published a new global study titled "CDO Insights 2026: Data governance and the trust paradox of data and AI literacy take center stage". The study found that while organizations are rapidly accelerating their use of AI, many face challenges with data readiness, data and AI literacy, required to realize the full value of their AI investments.

content.title: New Global CDO Report Reveals Data Governance and AI Literacy as Key Accelerators in AI Adoption
content.summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., January 27, 2026--Informatica from Salesforce, a leader in enterprise AI-powered cloud data management, has published a new global study titled "CDO Insights 2026: Data governance and the trust paradox of data and AI literacy take center stage". The study found that while organizations are rapidly accelerating their use of AI, many face challenges with data readiness, data and AI literacy, required to realize the full value of their AI investments.

headline: Is Salesforce.com (CRM) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Salesforce.com (CRM). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?
